description: Prudential Financial, a global financial services company, has revealed that over 2.5 million people had their personal information compromised in a February data breach. [...]
title: Prudential Financial now says 2.5 million impacted by data breach

description: CDK Global says that its dealer management system (DMS), impacted by a massive IT outage following a June 18th ransomware attack, will be back online by Thursday for all car dealerships. [...]
title: CDK Global says all dealers will be back online by Thursday

description: An Australian man was charged by Australia's Federal Police (AFP) for allegedly conducting an 'evil twin' WiFi attack on various domestic flights and airports in Perth, Melbourne, and Adelaide to steal other people's email or social media credentials. [...]
title: Australian charged for ‘Evil Twin’ WiFi attack on plane

description: Cisco has patched an NX-OS zero-day exploited in April attacks to install previously unknown malware as root on vulnerable switches. [...]
title: Cisco warns of NX-OS zero-day exploited to deploy custom malware

description: Modern Intel processors, including chips from the Raptor Lake and the Alder Lake generations are susceptible to a new type of a high-precision Branch Target Injection (BTI) attack dubbed 'Indirector,' which could be used to steal sensitive information from the CPU. [...]
title: Latest Intel CPUs impacted by new Indirector side-channel attack

description: A new OpenSSH unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability dubbed "regreSSHion" gives root privileges on glibc-based Linux systems. [...]
title: New regreSSHion OpenSSH RCE bug gives root on Linux servers

description: BleepingComputer has verified that the helpdesk portal of a router manufacturer is currently sending MetaMask phishing emails in response to newly filed support tickets, in what appears to be a compromise. [...]
title: Router maker's support portal hacked, replies with MetaMask phishing

description: BleepingComputer has verified that the helpdesk portal of a router manufacturer is currently sending MetaMask phishing emails in response to newly filed support tickets, in what appears to be a compromise. [...]
title: Router maker's support portal responds with MetaMask phishing
